titleStmt.title: A brief apology in behalf of the people in derision call'd Quakers. Written for the information of our sober and well-inclined neighbors in and about the town of Warminster in the county of Wilts. by Will. Chandler, Alex. Pyott, Jo. Hodges, and some others.
titleStmt.author: Chandler, William.
Pyott, Alex. (Alexander)
Hodges, Joseph.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
